attributes.action: ensure greater transparency and accountability surrounding newspapers and their websites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Contributors to online newspaper discussion groups and reader’s contribution areas need to be protected from the websites’ in house regulators to ensure fairness and inappropriate censorship. Whereas there is a need for all such sites to protect their communities from bad language, prejudice, slander, malicious language and all manner of inappropriate material, the public have a right to all views and opinions appropriately presented by all contributors. It should be legislated that it is inappropriate for material to be excluded because it does not harmonise with the institutions Editorial position or offers a different line to or appropriate criticism towards a particular writer or article. The institution should be responsible for justifying the rejection of any offered material and should be accountable for any such censorship.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
